search.title: Keyword
search.description: Business type or keyword to search on Yelp (e.g., 'plumber').

location.title: Location
location.description: City or area to search in (e.g., 'San Francisco, CA').

yelpSearchUrl.title: Yelp search URL
yelpSearchUrl.description: Full Yelp search URL. If provided, overrides keyword+location.

maxResults.title: Max results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of business listings to scrape.

fetchContactsFromWebsite.title: Scrape contacts from website
fetchContactsFromWebsite.description: If true, the actor will visit the business website and attempt to extract emails, phones, and social links.

contactPagePaths.title: Contact page paths
contactPagePaths.description: Relative paths to try on business websites for contact info.

useResidentialProxy.title: Use residential proxies
useResidentialProxy.description: Whether to use Apify residential proxy group. Strongly recommended for Yelp scraping.

maxConcurrency.title: Max concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of parallel browser pages to run.

debugScreenshots.title: Save screenshots on block/captcha
debugScreenshots.description: If true, saves a screenshot when a request fails for debugging.
